About Me

I develop integrations and state-of-the-art websites/systems for a living. I also advocate for the free web.

My current goals are to settle in a new, peaceful place where I can build and help the local community, and to keep learning more about my craft.

The "dl" part of my nickname comes from the initial letters of my surnames.

This portfolio will soon have translations to other languages, such as portuguese and french!
